tn.esprit.querybuilder.interfaces

Interface QbQuery

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    QbDelete, QbInsert, QbSelect, QbUpdate

    public interface QbQuery
    Parent interface for a select, update, insert or delete query. QbQuery child interfaces should be created using a DB specific Factory instance.
    Author:
    Dhia

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPlaceholderIndex(java.lang.String placeholderName)
      Gets the index of a placeholder.
      java.lang.String getQueryString()
      Gets the created query string that needs to be passed to Connection.prepareStatement(String).

    • Method Detail

      • getQueryString

        java.lang.String getQueryString()
        Gets the created query string that needs to be passed to Connection.prepareStatement(String).
        Returns:
        The query string.

      • getPlaceholderIndex

        int getPlaceholderIndex(java.lang.String placeholderName)
        Gets the index of a placeholder.
        Parameters:
        placeholderName - - The name of the placeholder value.
        Returns:
        An integer (starting at 1) that can be passed to PreparedStatement::set* functions.
